```{r}
library(readxl)
pt <- read_excel("ICJTR+Basic+Training+Data+Set.xlsx")
colnames(pt)[colnames(pt) == '\"POLICE OFFICER MINIMUM AGE\"'] <- "police min age"
pt <- pt %>% select(STATE, `POLICE BASIC TRAINING HRS 2020`, `POLICE FIELD TRAINING`, `police min age`)
pt
```
